extendedInfo.description: Coin Dozer: Seasons rolls Christmas, Valentineâs and Easter into a single game with more holidays to come in the future! With 3 machines to master, get ready for the biggest Coin Dozer ever, Coin Dozer: Seasons!In Coin Dozer: Seasons youâll be returning to the rooftops, helping Santa deliver coins and presents down the chimney. Switch machines in the game and you can start collecting gifts for Valentine's Day! Switch again and you can fill your basket with eggs and chocolate bunnies for Easter! Don't drop anything off the sides if you want to have the perfect holiday! But don't worry too much, with multiple holidays to play there are lots of prizes to collect from Easter hats to Valentine's bears to sugar cookies! Gain levels for special effects and grab special coins to further increase your coin-collecting power! Don't be bothered if you run out of coins, more coins will be giving filling you with holiday cheer soon. Keep checking back to complete your collection!Coin Dozer Holidays includes:- Cheerful new 3D graphics!- The best physics of any coin game!- With three holidays to play, there are over 100 prizes to collect!- Tons of special effects!- Seasons will grow! There are more holidays to be added in the future!Watch for more updates soon!

reviews.title: 5 star
reviews.comment: Great and very addictive, time just seems to fly bye. Love it love it love it.-:)
reviews.author: geraldine o

reviews.title: Delightfully entertaining
reviews.comment: A wonderfully, happy little game to pass the time and share with your toddlers!
reviews.author: Jenny Trinder

reviews.title: Love it, but..
reviews.comment: Live this game. I really do.  I just wish it had the new setup like the original and didn t reset everytime I came on. Would be so much better if it continued the previous game.
reviews.author: Janay Stewart

reviews.title: Brenda
reviews.comment: I love the original game. This game is good, too. However it resets itself & the walls don\'t stay up long. I also think they should give you an option of what season you want to start with. Other than that, it\'s pretty good.
reviews.author: Brenda Weitzmann

reviews.title: It\'s great!
reviews.comment: I like playing the quarter games like this and this game is the perfect way for me to play and not go broke.
reviews.author: Yonika Wilson

reviews.title: Love the game
reviews.comment: Love the game...its so addictive...but the notification ad that runs at the bottom stalls the game and even freezes it at times. That\'s the only problem i have...no issues with any of the other ads that pop up or run at the bottom of the screen.
reviews.author: Michelle Denslow

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love Coin Dozer. It can keep me entertained for hours. I haven\'t found a game with a more addictive quality. It\'s simple and fun. Great for kids and adults alike.
reviews.author: Sara Rondeau

reviews.title: It\'s alot of fun!
reviews.comment: If you want a simple game that\'s alot of fun this is the game for you!  If you know enough about physics then you shouldn\'t have a problem with too many coins falling over the sides.  You also get to collect prizes and puzzle pieces.  Download it, give it a chance!
reviews.author: Jenette Baughman

reviews.title: Dont lock the seasons
reviews.comment: I like it but the valentine season and easter are locked and if we wanf them we must pay! Thats not right! People shouldnt spend money on fake coins.
reviews.author: Terena Tan

reviews.title: Lame, like the original
reviews.comment: A complete,  unproductive waste of time. Don\'t bother or you will be mad at yourself later.
reviews.author: Jay Burton

reviews.comment: Its ok coins never reginerate fast enough.not enough bonus coins ,far and few same prizes keep falling
reviews.author: barbie simpson

reviews.title: Coindizer seasons
reviews.comment: I like this game it\'s fun but I wish it wouldn\'t reset itself ,it also seems like prizes do not fall enough.
reviews.author: Melissa Settle

reviews.title: Sucks!
reviews.comment: Original coin dozer is so much better! Why does it reset all of the coins on the table every time I leave the game? This game is horrible. Always puts bonuses on the edge so the fall in the gutter. Waste if time!
reviews.author: Melissa Grundy

reviews.title: Great and fun
reviews.comment: Boring at some points but gives you excitement when u win something. .
reviews.author: Alyssa Rutherford

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Wish you were given more coins when offline but overall a great time passing game
reviews.author: Candice Grey

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Nice way to pass a few minutes, need more coins or coin walls but a good challenge after that
reviews.author: Kelly Willson

reviews.title: Fun game but ads are REALLY ANNOYING!
reviews.comment: I love this game, it is very addictive and as most the others have said a quick way to pass time. My one issue are the way the ads are displayed. I\'ve had this game for about a week and I don\'t mind getting a pop up ad every so often, but today I was playing it and now there seem to be ads that pop up right in the middle of the playfield that you can\'t get rid of. It affects the ability to play the game and I am about ready to uninstall because of this!
reviews.author: Trisha Backman

reviews.title: Awesone game. Highly addictive!!
reviews.comment: I love this game.  Its got lots of prizes anf lots free coins and easy to level up and earn more coins. Its a must have on ur phone. I got my husband addicted!!  Dozer it up!!
reviews.author: Claudia S

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Great app but takes a bit too long to generate free coins and no shake option
reviews.author: Gill Lyon

reviews.title: I feel like I love it.
reviews.comment: I love it . It was the best but when I run out of coins you have to stay and sit for 30seconds.      :-)
reviews.author: marissa lyon
